page.title: 06LIVING AT EPPLETON
page.content: I live at 4,Aiden Way, Hetton-le-Hole, Tyne & Wear DH5 9BN. I live in a{semi-detached house. We have lived there for eight years. We have a large lounge and dining room with a{sun-room}off the dining room. We have a kitchen which was extended by my dad. In the house upstairs there are three bedrooms, two big ones and one small one which is mine. Also upstairs we have a bathroom with a shower in it, and a toilet by itself. We have twenty one sockets in our house and two in the garage. We have eighteen lights in our house. We have{ten doors.}Our house was built by Pearson, a local builder in 1972 or 1975. That is my house.
